name: Komodo Decks
description: Komodo Decks is an all-in-one screen recording and AI-powered SOP generator for teams to create and share interactive videos and guides.
longDescription: Komodo Decks is a versatile platform designed to streamline team productivity through seamless screen recording and AI-driven tools. It allows users to capture unlimited screen videos, automatically transform them into shareable standard operating procedures (SOPs), and generate AI-powered meeting notes and summaries. The platform supports businesses, educators, and content creators by simplifying the creation of high-quality instructional content and enhancing team collaboration. Its browser-based interface and Chrome extension make it accessible and easy to use without requiring advanced technical skills. By integrating features like real-time analytics and collaborative spaces, Komodo Decks addresses the need for efficient asynchronous communication and documentation.
features: Unlimited screen recording allows users to capture videos of any length without restrictions, ideal for creating detailed tutorials or demos.
AI-powered meeting notes automatically generate summaries and action items from recorded calls, saving time and improving productivity.
Komodo Guides transforms screen recordings into interactive step-by-step SOPs, simplifying the creation of detailed documentation.
The cloud-based video editor enables quick and easy editing of recorded or uploaded videos directly in the browser.
Real-time analytics provide insights into viewer engagement, including view counts and comments, to track content performance.
The Spaces feature facilitates team collaboration by grouping members and enabling built-in annotation and commenting.
Custom branding options allow users to personalize the viewing experience with tailored video pages.
The Chrome extension enables instant screen recording directly from the browser with a single click.
Mobile apps for iOS and Android support video creation from presentations, enhancing flexibility for on-the-go users.

faqs.question: What is Komodo Decks used for?
faqs.answer: Komodo Decks is used for screen recording, creating interactive SOPs, and generating AI-powered meeting notes to enhance team productivity and communication.

faqs.question: Is Komodo Decks free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Komodo Decks offers a free plan with unlimited screen recording and video creation, though some advanced features may require a paid plan.

faqs.question: How does the AI in Komodo Decks work?
faqs.answer: The AI analyzes recorded videos to generate meeting summaries, action items, and interactive guides, extracting key insights for easy sharing.

faqs.question: Can I edit videos on Komodo Decks?
faqs.answer: Yes, Komodo Decks provides a fully browser-based video editor to easily edit recorded or uploaded videos.

faqs.question: Does Komodo Decks support team collaboration?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Spaces feature allows teams to collaborate seamlessly with built-in annotations and commenting tools.

faqs.question: How does Komodo Decks compare to Loom?
faqs.answer: Komodo Decks offers unlimited recording and AI-driven SOP creation, often praised for fewer restrictions and more generous features compared to Loom.

faqs.question: Can I use Komodo Decks on mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Yes, Komodo Decks offers iOS and Android apps for creating and sharing videos from presentations or recordings.

faqs.question: Does Komodo Decks provide analytics for videos?
faqs.answer: Yes, it provides real-time analytics, including view counts and user comments, delivered daily to your inbox.
